sentences.en: Afore - mentioned adornment elements formed the vogue of dining - room, concise, sweet characteristic.
sentences.cn: 上述装饰元素形成了餐厅的时尚 、 简洁 、 温馨之特点.

sentences.en: At present we mainly produce shining fashionable toy motor adornment.
sentences.cn: 目前公司的主要产品有汽摩装饰品、闪光时尚玩具等系列.

sentences.en: Blood of wound or dust of travel that's a man's adornment.
sentences.cn: 伤口流出的鲜血和旅途的风尘,才是男子汉的装饰品呢.

sentences.en: Body adornment that further explores emotional and physiological sensing.
sentences.cn: 体饰品开始拥有情绪和生理传感功能了.

sentences.en: But women are peculiarly sensitive to their adornment.
sentences.cn: 不过妇女对于服饰一类的东西特别在意罢了.

sentences.en: Have adornment, the building adorns the product of material.
sentences.cn: 有装饰, 就有建筑装饰材料的制品.

sentences.en: He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
sentences.cn: 他的写作风格朴实简练, 很少添加饰词.

sentences.en: I always think that a fine set of teeth are an adornment to a man.
sentences.cn: 我一直认为,一副好牙齿是男子美的一种表现.

sentences.en: It was a building without any adornment or decoration.
sentences.cn: 它曾是一栋完全未经装修的大楼。

sentences.en: Lucie was busy with the adornment of her room.
sentences.cn: 露西正忙着布置她的房间.

sentences.en: Mary was busy with the adornment of the church.
Mary was busy with the adornment of the room.
sentences.cn: 玛丽正忙着布置她的房间.

sentences.en: She is lovely in a way that almost forbids adornment.
sentences.cn: 她美得简直不能再施脂粉.

sentences.en: Toilet articles belongs to kinds of spin adornment field is big breed.
sentences.cn: 盥洗用品属纺织装饰品领域大类品种.

sentences.en: Venus governs love beauty fun adornment - and profit.
sentences.cn: 金星掌管爱,美,乐趣,装饰,及收益.

trans.tran_en: something that you use to decorate something
